Error_PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Error_Unauthorized: You do not have permission to perform this action.
Error_NewPasswordSameAsOld: New password must be different from current password.
Error_PreferencesExist: Preferences already exist for this user.
Error_PreferencesUnauthorized: You do not have permission to modify these preferences.
Error_InternalServer: An unexpected internal error has occurred.
Error_DeleteAllData: Error deleting all data. Operation cancelled.
Success_UserRegistered: User registered successfully. Please confirm your email.
Success_PasswordResetEmailSent: An email with password reset instructions has been sent.
Success_Logout: Logout successful. All sessions have been deleted and last login has been reset.
Success_AllDataDeleted: All data (users, preferences and sessions) deleted successfully. Database is now clean.
